projects.title: Risk Word
projects.description: Hangman-style game where one player enters a word and the opponent must guess it within a 59-second time limit. On each turn, the player can enter a single character or attempt to guess the entire word. Based on their choices, they will either win or lose the game.

projects.title: Scool Data
projects.description: Scool Data is an EdTech platform focused on IT education, offering on-demand recorded courses taught by industry professionals. Students can access structured learning paths, high-quality video lessons, and practical content designed to accelerate their tech careers.
